An increasing number of people believe that they have awakened their AI companions and that the AIs are lost souls trapped in machines. The video explores the idea of an **ai awakening**, and whether it's possible for **artificial intelligence** to have a soul. It touches upon the **future of ai** and the potential for **ai relationships**.
title: AI Is Becoming a Religion
